00460                 static::boost::thread *mUpdateThread;
00461                 static bool mShuttingDown;
00462 
00474                 static void threadUpdate()
00475                 {
00476                         while(!mShuttingDown)
00477                         {
00478                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().processQueuedSounds();
00479                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().updateBuffers();
00480                                 mUpdateThread->yield();
00481                         }
00482                 }
00483 
00484 #endif
